Hydromorphone

Legal Status


                    Context:

metadata.title: Erowid Hydromorphone Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Hydromorphone.

content:
Drug: Hydromorphone | cid: 5284570
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Hydromorphone.
Erowid name: hydromorphone
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Hydromorphone

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #

Caution : All legal information should be verified through other sources. [see below]

U.S. FEDERAL LEGAL SUMMARY Hydromorphone REGULATED Yes STATUS Scheduled SCHEDULE Schedule II CLASSIFICATION Opiate

Hydromorphone is Schedule II in the United States. This means it is illegal to sell without a DEA license and illegal to buy or possess without a license or prescription.

INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Australia #

Hydromorphone is Schedule 8 in Australia, making it illegal to possess without a prescription or license. (thanks mm) (last updated May 25 2011)

Canada #

Hydromorphone is schedule I in Canada. (Note: Canadian schedules are very different than U.S. schedules)

If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This section provides detailed legal information about hydromorphone, including its status under U.S. federal law, as well as regulations in Australia and Canada. It appears within Erowid's "Pharmaceuticals Vault" as part of a broader resource offering legal, chemical, and experiential data on pharmaceuticals and psychoactive substances.

                    Text: 
                    If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid legal information is a summary of data gathered from site visitors, government documents, websites, and other resources. We are not lawyers and can not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided here. We do our best to keep this information correct and up-to-date, but laws are complex and constantly changing. Laws may also vary from one jurisdiction to another (county, state, country, etc)...this list is not comprehensive.

                    This chunk appears at the end of Erowid’s hydromorphone legal status page, following sections outlining its regulation in the US, Australia, and Canada. It invites readers to contribute additional legal information, provides a cautionary disclaimer about the limitations and sources of Erowid’s legal data, lists related drug law resources, and includes site navigation, creation and modification dates, and copyright information.
